en.bdb: Being pleased, he is absorbed with the residents of Mathura

en.bdb: “He did not increase the happiness of the inhabitants of Braja, but gave them only sufferings

ss.gurmukhi: hy aUDv! ienRhw (gopIAW nUM) (ikRSn) duK dy igAw hY Aqy iPr (ienRhw dy) mn ivc hulws viDAw hI nhIN hY।

verse.unicode: ਆਪ ਨ ਥੇ ਬ੍ਰਿਜ ਮੈ ਉਪਜੇ ਇਨ ਸੋ ਸੁ ਭਏ ਛਿਨ ਬੀਚ ਪਰਾਏ ॥੯੫੧॥

en.bdb: Krishna born in Braja was our own, but now in an instant he belongs to others.”951.

ss.gurmukhi: auh Awp ienRhw qoN bRj ivc nhIN aupjy sn, (ies leI) auh iCx Br ivc prwey ho gey hn ]951]
